name: develop-a-restful-api-to-manage-user-information
description: Develop a RESTful API to manage user information: 1-Use Node.js, Express, and MongoDB to create, read, update, and delete (CRUD) user records. 2-Store user information such as name, email, and password securely in the database. 3-Implement proper input validation for all API requests to ensure data integrity.
